channel.title: Multiarmed Bandits on Justin Dixon
channel.description: Recent content in Multiarmed Bandits on Justin Dixon

item.title: Multiarmed Bandits: Chapter 2 IRL
item.description: Introduction This is going to be part of series where I illustrate examples and questions from the brilliant book by Sutton and Barto Sutton and Barto (1998). You can download the pdf version of the newly updated book online, just google it. I am planning on going through each chapter and illustrating 1 or 2 examples from each chapter. MultiArmed Bandits What on earth is a mutliarmed bandit? It might be easier to think of it as which pokie you choose to play on down at the local.
